summary: Modified Daedric Bow found in High Hrothgar.
descriptionHtml: Modified Daedric bow that I made in spite of wanting to make a weapons mod. I know it's not the best, but I'm trying. If my lore is wrong in the weapon description in-game, I'm sorry. I didn't really pay attention to the game's storyline of the previous eras. If you want to know the enchantment on it, it's Absorb Health. 06 if you've ever used the Creation Kit. Thanks for downloading if you do, and if you don't then I understand this is adequate.
author: iWounded
